name: Earl the Tomb Robber (C64)
description:
Take Earl the Tomb Robber on an adventure in search of treasure!

  • Right/Left to move
  • Fire Button to Jump
  • Up to climb ladders
  • Down to set bombs
  • Go all the way to the top left corner of the screen to collect bombs
  • Use bombs to blow up doors and enemies!

(Made with Gary Kitchen's Game Maker.)
